entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
